AI Sensei

The Problem: Learning Too Many Words at Once âš¡

Imagine you have 1000 vocabulary words to master. Day 1: you review 1000 words. Some you remember vaguely, some you've already mastered. Day 2: you filter out the words you already know, leaving only the ones you're not confident with. A Week passes - words you once knew are now uncertain, so you have to review all 1000 words again!!!

With NinjaLingo, we track every word. Hard words? We bring them up frequently. Easy words? We calculate and bring them up for review at the perfect time using Spaced Repetition technique. This way, we don't waste much time, but we remember more accurately and for longer.

Ninja Training Method

1. Assess Your Strike

Very easy, perfect recall = 5 points
Remember but not sure = 4 points
Can't remember at all = 0 points
Sensei learns your skill level

2. Schedule Training for Each Word

Very easy = Review again later
Remember but unsure = Review soon
Can't remember = Review immediately
Each word gets its perfect timing

3. Strike at Perfect Moment

Review when memory is "about to fade"
Not too early, not too late
Maximum efficiency, lasting results
